TitlePage.Title: &Digraphs;
TitlePage.Subtitle: Methods for digraphs
TitlePage.Author: Julius Jonušas jj252@st-and.ac.uk http://www-circa.mcs.st-and.ac.uk/~julius
James D. Mitchell jdm3@st-and.ac.uk http://tinyurl.com/jdmitchell
Michael Torpey mct25@st-and.ac.uk
Wilf Wilson waw7@st-and.ac.uk http://www-groups.mcs.st-and.ac.uk/~waw7

TitlePage.Abstract: The &Digraphs; package is a &GAP; package containing methods for graphs, digraphs, and multidigraphs.
TitlePage.Acknowledgements: We would like to thank Chris Jefferson for his help in including the &bliss; tool in the package. We would also like to thank Max Neunhöffer, who wrote the code that inspired this package's methods for computing digraph homomorphisms, and Artur Schäfer, who independently created the same algorithm.
